name: Cat Cat Cat Factories
description:
Game Outline

This is a factory management simulation, where you hire cute cats as workers and run your factory efficiently to manufacture various items.

  • The factory runs automatically with equipment placement, summoning cats, and requesting orders,
    so you can play without thinking too deeply. However, instantaneous decisions are also important.
  • This is a job shop production type rather than a line production type, which is familiar in factory production simulations.
    It's also fun to train cat workers to be specialists in their respective skills.
  • The cats, as workers, are so cute, working busy, that you’ll never get bored!
Operating environment

It runs on Windwos10 64bit.
(Doesn't work on 32bit.)

Notes on early access

Cat Cat Cat Factories is a beta version.

  • There may be some defects.
  • Currently, there is only one stage, but more stages will be added in the future. New features will be added as well.
  • After the update, you may not be able to use the saved data of the previous version.
  • The price may increase with the update.
  • All future versions will be provided free of charge to those who purchase this once.
